Caleb Colton.Action: Successfully traps and kills a mosquito with his forearm strength and focus.
Lays in a broke down truck looking bored and disengaged, showing passivity and lack of motivation.

Walks determinedly and somewhat painfully toward home despite discomfort from bright light and pain.
